= Introduction =

With this tool you can modify your PRTG Server download page to let your users download the TrayNotifier and NotifierGadget from the download page of your own PRTG Server.


= Details =

The modified section can be installed in English, German, French, Spanish and Dutch.
After running the tool, your PRTG Server download page can look like this:

http://ptf-prtgaddons.googlecode.com/files/distribution_webpage.png

For more details, see the pdf that is included in the [PTF_Tools_VersionHistory download].
